With mercury crossing the 40 degree Celsius mark in Coimbatore, fruits, and fruit juices have become favourite thirst-quenchers for many a citizen. The major attractions are: water melons available for Rs. 18 to Rs. 20 a kg; tender coconuts at Rs. 25; sugarcane juice at Rs. 10 to Rs. 20 (depending on the size of glass); ice-apples at Rs. 10 to Rs. 20; and cucumbers Rs. 10 for a packet containing two pieces. The major concern of citizens is the quality of water used in preparing juices, and cleanliness.

– Photos: S. Siva Saravanan, and M. Periasamy
title: Beating the heat
